radialcolordialog

Class ColorBand

  • java.lang.Object
    • radialcolordialog.ColorBand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InteractiveSlider

    public class ColorBand
extends java.lang.Object
implements InteractiveSlider
    The ColorBand is a radially aligned slider for color channels (r,g,b, etc.). This is designed to use the other related color channels for a mixing effect when selecting a color. I.e. : A change to the red channel will show in the blue and green ColorBands. The blue and green bands will mix in the red value. Color channels are stored in scalar values from 0.0 to 1.0;

    • Constructor Detail

      • ColorBand

        public ColorBand(ColorBandListener listener,
                 TupleType cType,
                 Channel channel,
                 java.awt.geom.Point2D center,
                 double radius,
                 double arcBegin,
                 double arcEnd,
                 double width)
        Build the color band from the color and layout specifications
        Parameters:
        listener - Listener for changes to the selected channel.
        cType - The type of color (RGB or HSB).
        channel - The channel of the color (r,g,b; or h,s,b).
        center - The center point to layout from.
        radius - The radius of the ColorBand.
        arcBegin - The arc starting angle in radians..
        arcEnd - The arc ending angle in radians.
        width - The width of the ColorBand.

      • containsPolar

        public boolean containsPolar(double distance,
                             double theta)
        See if this ColorBand contains the polar coordinates.
        Parameters:

        theta - The angle in radians.
        Returns:
        true if this ColorBand contains the coordinates, false otherwise.

      • render

        public void render(java.awt.Graphics2D g2)
        Render the Color Band. This renders the band by painting the arc sweep with radially aligned lines. THe colors are generated from the color range.
        Parameters:
        g2 - The graphics object to render to.

      • renderOutlineMask

        public void renderOutlineMask(java.awt.Graphics2D g2)
        Render an outline mask for this Color band. This renders a full circle for the inner and outer radii to masks the edges of the color band.
        Parameters:
        g2 - Th graphics object to render to.

      • renderHandle

        public void renderHandle(java.awt.Graphics2D g2)
        Render the color band handle. This is done as a second pass to draw on top of the anti-aliasing masks.
        Parameters:
        g2 - The graphics object to paint to.
